name: Instant WebP Converter
author: Mokhlesur Rahman

sections.description:
Instant WebP Converter automatically converts JPEG and PNG images to WebP format to enhance website performance and speed.

Watch Tutorial:

Here is a detailed video guide to help you understand the plugin: Watch Tutorial.

Short Description

Instant WebP Converter automatically converts JPEG and PNG images to the optimized WebP format, enhancing your website’s speed and performance.

Author

Mokhlesur Rahman
sections.installation:
1. Upload the instant-webp-converter folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The plugin will automatically convert existing images on activation.
sections.faq:
Will the original images be deleted?

Yes, the plugin deletes original JPEG and PNG images after converting them to WebP format to save storage space.

Does this plugin support SVG images?

Currently, the plugin only supports JPEG and PNG image formats.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Added YouTube tutorial link.
  • Enhanced image conversion process for better quality retention.

1.0.1

  • Initial release.
  • Converts existing images on activation.
